alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:16AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Vilas and northwestern Oneida Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 516 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Squirrel Lake, or 20 miles southeast of Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Squirrel Lake around 525 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
